CheckBoxPreference.android:title: FPS Debugging
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Overlay FPS information and print debug FPS info about animations

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Animations FPS Summaries
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: At the end of animations, Toasts and logs to logcat debug information about the FPS during that transition. Currently only supported for transitions (animated navigations).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto reload on JS change
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Reload JS automatically when JS changes. It's required for this to work to have dev server connection setup correctly.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Debug server host for device
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Debug server host for downloading JS bundle or communicating with JS debugger. With this setting empty launcher should work fine when running on emulator (or genymotion) and connection to debug server running on emulator's host
